Description: Available NOW or for Sept1 or for October 1. Freshly painted 2 bed/2bath in Newton! Large living room with a balcony. Modern kitchen and bathrooms. One bedroom is a master with a bathroom suite. Another bedroom is smaller and has a separate bathroom. Ample closet space throughout. 3rd floor, rear facing apartment in a building with elevator. Comes with one assigned garage space. Common laundry in this professionally managed building.
